name: Can I Get A Selfie?
description:
Please play in full screen, Or the Windows Build :)

Block the fans using ropes and barricades to help Mr. Mars reach the door, every day.

Controls

  • Use W,A,S,D for movement
  • Use Right Mouse Button (RMB) to Pickup / Drop.
  • Use Left Mouse Button (LMB) to interact / push. (To make ropes or push People)

Made in 48h for GMTK Jam 2020
